name: Shard Shuffle
description:
Shard Shuffle plunges you into a world that combines strategic skill and puzzle-solving. The goal is clear: strategically place pieces with various properties on the game board to destroy other elements and score points. Each piece has a certain number of life points and a distinct attack type.

The game reaches its conclusion when the board can no longer accommodate new pieces. This is why methodical planning of your strategy is crucial to optimally eliminate pieces.

However, piece destruction is only part of the equation to boost your high score. A combo system awards you additional points when you eliminate multiple pieces in one go. This allows you to obtain a highly explosive bomb, ideal for clearing a part of the board cluttered with pieces.

The game also features a challenge system, adding a dose of excitement by presenting random challenges to earn more points and Shards. Once collected, these Shards unlock customization elements to enrich the gaming experience according to your preferences.
